Who was on the committee with Adams to draft  a Declaration of Independence?	Thomas Jefferson, Benjamin Franklin, Robert R. Livingston and Roger Sherman.

Who were the midnight judges?	They were a series of judges, so called because most of them were formally appointed days before Adams' presidential term expired
Who were the midnight judges?	They were judges formally appointed days before Adams term expired
In what ways was Adams opposed by Anderw Hamilton?	Hamilton wanted to control the army differently than Adams

The John Adams Library , housed at the Boston Public Library , contains what?	Adams's personal collection of more than 3,500 volumes
Adams ' opponents were what?	Democratic Republicans
